name: Slam 'n Jam '95
overview: Biggest players! Fastest 5 on 5 action! Rotoscoped moves! Here you can strip and dip, shake and bake, and knock down twos all over the court! Pound the hardwood in the Franchise Player mode for an entire season. Dominate the boards as the go-to center or pull up at the arc and drain a 3 pointer as a point guard. Replay all the in-your-face highlights. Fully controllable from all angles. Tailor made for gloating. Hit the Speed Burst and go eye-to-eye with the iron. Call double teams, make roster substitutions, reject shots into the fourth row, set screens and picks. Get pumped with CD quality stadium music, sampled shoe squeaks and fanatical crowd noises.
